title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard without typing anything in the package name field, a message appears at the top: "A folder corresponding to the package name already exists".
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard without typing anything in the package name field, no message should appear.
SR:
1. Open the New Java Package wizard.
2. Leave the package name field blank.
3. Verify that no message appears at the top of the wizard.
